The turret is a small weapon mount which houses the mechanism of a projectile-firing weapon. It has a 360-degree viewability which means it can turn in any direction to detect possible hostile mobs. If one is detected it will immediately try to eliminate the target. How does it work? To get a turret in the Overworld you will need to use the shulker spawn egg. It might be possible to bring a shulker from the End to the Overworld (and hereâ€™s a guide for that) but donâ€™t take my word for it. Standard turrets are purple and thatâ€™s how they will initialy look like once youâ€™ve found or spawned one. Place one down a few of them at some strategic positions and let them deal with the monsters while you are inside sleeping. The different turrets have different attacks. The green ones shoot large fireballs and as a result I recommend that you place them not too close to your creations to avoid possible accidents. Itâ€™s really the ultimate addon for anyone who want to increase the security for their bases in-game!
description-ru: Чтобы получить турель в обычном мире Вам нужно использовать яйцо спавна шалкера. Возможно, можно будет каким-то образом переместить шалкера из Края в обычный мир
description-pt: Para obter uma torre no mundo comum, você precisa usar o ovo do shalker do gerador. Talvez seja possível de alguma forma mover o Shalker do Edge para o mundo comum
name: Protective Turrets

description: How does it work? Look up into the night sky. Do you see something different? The moon looks infected. What could that be? It must be some kind of sickness which is causing this. Monsters also look different and their behaviors have been radically changed to resemble those of an enderman. No one really knows the root cause for these issues but itâ€™s clear that something ainâ€™t right. The night is extremely dangerous. Monsters have gained the ability to teleport and this makes them almost unstoppable. Also skeletons and zombies are no longer affected by sunlight. The only way to stop them is to make sure that youâ€™ve got some water with you. Apparently they donâ€™t like it. Every time that you kill one of the affected mobs (see list further down) there is a chance that it will drop an ender pearl. The Ender Dragon has never before been more powerful. Here are some of its new abilities.
description-ru: Как это работает? Монстры также выглядят по-разному, и их поведение радикально изменилось, чтобы они напоминали поведение эндермана. Ночь чрезвычайно опасна. У монстров появилась способность телепортироваться, и это делает их почти неостановимыми.
description-pt: Como isso funciona? Os monstros também se parecem diferentes, e seu comportamento mudou radicalmente para se assemelhar ao comportamento do enderman. A noite é extremamente perigosa. Os monstros têm a capacidade de se teletransportar, o que os torna quase imparáveis.
name: Ender Sickness

description: 1.Settings > Global Resources > Activate the resource pack 2.Create a new world and add the behavior pack only. 3.Start the world. Toxic rivers, a fiery moon and mutated monsters are the first few signs of a world turning to hell. Most of the Overworld (and other dimensions) have been turned into a nightmare. The night creatures are much more powerful and there are also new monster types with new abilities. Everyone have a desperate desire to live, but only a few of you will. Even friendly mobs have realized the evil of (some) humans and will escape them at any cost. A Changed World. The environment is completely different. Water looks like toxic waste and the moon is on fire. The monsters thrive in this new environment. Never before in Minecraftâ€™s history have they been more powerful. There is no point complaining about the weather. There are things much worse from here on part of your reality. Escaping into other dimensions will not save you. The Nether and the End have also been infected by the same evil virus which has set roots in the Overworld.
description-ru: Теперь окружающая Вас среда мира МКПЕ станет совсем иной! Луна стала кровавой, а все водоёмы вокруг - ядовитыми. Монстры, которые будут охотиться за Вами по ночам, еще никогда не были такими опасными.
description-pt: Agora, o mundo ao seu redor, o MCPE, será completamente diferente! A lua tornou-se sangrenta, e todas as lagoas ao redor - venenosas. Os monstro que vão caçar por você na noite nunca foram tão perigosos.
name: Danger Inbound Meltdown Edition

description: How does it work? The car replaces the witch and as a result you can find them spawning in swamp biomes. In case you donâ€™t want to make the (awful) trip to a (stinky) swamp then you can spawn them simply by using the witch spawn egg. Sure, it looks really cool but you can obviously also use it for driving. It wonâ€™t start driving until youâ€™ve equipped the key (carrot on a stick) in your hand. To stop the car from driving simply change your active hotbar slot to something else. Itâ€™s really a marvelous piece of art which is quite similar to the other Lamborghini add-on but with a few differences to the 3D design, colors and textures.
description-ru: Новый спортивный автомобиль является заменой ведьм, и это значит, что Lamborghini Veneno Вы сможете найти в болотах, либо Вы можете сильно облегчить себе жизнь и использовать для этого яйцо спавна ведьмы из творческого режима.
description-pt: O novo carro esportivo é um substituto para bruxas, o que significa que Lamborghini Veneno pode ser encontrado nos pântanos, ou você pode facilitar sua vida e usar o ovo da bruxa do regime criativo para isso.
name: Lamborghini Veneno

description: Did you know that it was once possible to milk squids? I for sure didnâ€™t know that until now. But according to the Minecraft Wiki it was possible to milk squids in beta version 1.2 of Minecraft for PC. This addon adds this old (and no longer existing) PC feature to Minecraft Pocket Edition! How does it work? Itâ€™s very simple. All youâ€™ll need is a bucket and a squid.
description-ru: Мод предоставит Вам возможность добывать молоко из спрутов.
description-pt: Mod lhe dará a oportunidade de extrair leite do polvo.
name: Milkable Squids

description: How to drive a spaceship? The blaze is replaced by a spaceship. You can either go to the Nether to find a spaceship or just spawn one by using a blaze spawn egg. The iron armor is replaced by a space suit. It doesnâ€™t give you any extra abilities but it looks suitable for space travel. You canâ€™t go the moon just yet but rumors say that eventually you will be able to go to space since there will likely be a map created for it in the future. For now though, I recommend using it with the Moonscape map. Throw some eggs at it to launch the spaceship. It will stay in air for about 1 minute before it needs some more rocket fuel (eggs). Hold a key (carrot on a stick) to control the direction of the vehicle.
description-ru: Ифрит был заменён космическим кораблём. Вы можете отправиться либо в Нижний мир, чтобы найти космический корабль, либо просто создать его, используя яйцо спавна ифрита. Железная броня MCPE была заменена на космический костюм. Костюм не даёт Вам никаких новых способностей, но отлично подходит для космических путешествий.
description-pt: Ifrit foi substituído por uma nave espacial. Você pode ir ao Mundo Inferior para encontrar uma nave espacial, ou simplesmente criá-la usando o ovo da geração do Efreet. A armadura de ferro MCPE foi substituída por um terno espacial. O traje não lhe dá novas habilidades, mas é ótimo para viagens espaciais.
name: Spaceship

description: How does it work? War planes can be found spawning mostly everywhere since they replace chickens. But you can obviously use a chicken spawn egg as well to more easily spawn one. The airplane has a couple of different uses but itâ€™s main feature is flying. However, it got seats for just one player. To start the airplane engine you will simply need to use some fuel cans (snowballs). Throw them at the vehicle to use them. Use the airplane inventory (sneak and long press OR right-click) to store some fuel cans or whatever else you might need on your trip. To control the airplane you will need a joystick (carrot on a stick) equipped in your hand. If you run out of fuel then you will need to throw some more fuel cans at the airplane. The fighter aircraft carries two machine guns which are mounted in the wings. As soon as a hostile mob (e.g. spiders or zombies) are detected within a 48 blocks radius it will instantly start shooting.
description-ru: Спавн военных самолёт можно найти повсюду, поскольку они являются заменой куриц. Самолёт может использовать в различных целях, но главной его функцией остаётся полёт. Чтобы запустить двигатель самолёта Вам понадобится лишь использовать топливные баки (снежки). Бросьте их на транспортное средство, чтобы использовать их.
description-pt: O desenvolvimento de uma aeronave militar pode ser encontrado em todos os lugares, pois eles são um substituto para galinhas. A aeronave pode usar para vários fins, mas sua principal função continua a ser o voo. Para iniciar o motor da aeronave, você precisará apenas usar tanques de combustível (bolas de neve). Jogue-os no veículo para usá-los.
name: War Plane

description: How does it work? You can trade with any of the following animals and it works much similar to trading with villagers. Just make sure that youâ€™ve got something to exchange with them. Emeralds are no good here as they will want things such as wheat, carrots or similar. he traded items which in this case was some raw beef will be added to your inventory.
description-ru: Теперь Вы сможете торговать с любым из животных  и это будет очень похоже на то, как Вы торгуете с деревенскими жителями. Просто убедитесь в том, что у Вас есть возможность с ними чем-то обменяться. Изумруды их не устроят, так как они нуждаются в таких вещах, как пшеница, морковь и им подобных.
description-pt: Agora você pode trocar com qualquer um dos animais e será muito parecido com o comércio com os moradores. Certifique-se de que você tenha a oportunidade de trocar algo com eles. As esmeraldas não se adequam a elas, pois precisam de coisas como trigo, cenouras e outros.
name: Animal Trade

description: How does it work? Snow gorillas spawn in villages (since they replace iron golems) but they can also be spawned by building an iron structure with four iron blocks and one pumpkin. For some reason the gorilla wonâ€™t move unless you ride it. I think this is a bug and it will most likely be fixed in an future update. Make sure that you hold a snowball in your hand in order to control the direction of the gorilla while riding it. Itâ€™s a very fast mob and as a result they arenâ€™t easy to control in rough terrains such as jungles. Itâ€™s a more suitable mount for open fields.
description-ru: Снежные гориллы появляются в деревнях (поскольку они заменяют железных големов), но их также можно заспавнить, построив железную структуру с четырьмя железными блоками и одной тыквой.
description-pt: Os gorilas de neve aparecem nas aldeias (como substituem os golems de ferro), mas também podem ser engolidos pela construção de uma estrutura de ferro com quatro blocos de ferro e uma abóbora.
name: Giant Snow Gorilla

description: This is an addon which will reduce the size of all spiders (meaning, normal spiders and cave spiders) to a more realistic size. Itâ€™s now harder to kill them since their hitbox has also been largly reduced. However, to balance their powers they have been given a new weakness and that is water. At the same time itâ€™s more realistic it also makes survival mode more difficult since they can be just as aggressive as before. The spiders are still hostile only during the night. However, I do recommend that you keep a bucket of water on you in case you ever have to deal with them swiftly.
description-ru: Мод  уменьшит размеры всех пауков мира до более реалистичного размера. Теперь их будет труднее убить, так как область удара по ним также значительно уменьшилась. Однако, для того чтобы сбалансировать их силы, им была дана новая слабость и это вода.
description-pt: Mod reduzirá o tamanho de todas as aranhas do mundo para um tamanho mais realista. Agora, será mais difícil matá-los, já que a área de impacto sobre eles também diminuiu significativamente. No entanto, para equilibrar sua força, eles receberam uma nova fraqueza e isso é água.
name: Smaller Spiders

description: How does it work? The jetpack replaces blazes. You can either go to the Nether to find one or preferably spawn one using a blaze spawn egg. The jetpack design looks a little like a pair of flying pants, but it is in fact a jetpack and not a pair of pants! Throw a Bottle oâ€™ Enchanting once youâ€™ve mounted the jetpack to start flying. The fuel lasts for about 5 seconds before you need to refill it again. You are supposed to be able to use some gunpowder to boost it but I couldnâ€™t find a way to do it.
description-ru: Реактивный ранец заменяет ифрита. Вы можете либо отправиться в Нижний мир МКПЕ, чтобы найти одного из них, либо использовать яйцо спавна ифрита.
description-pt: O pacote de jatos substitui o efreet. Você pode ir ao Mundo Inferior do MCPE para encontrar um deles, ou usar o ovo da germinação do efreet.
name: Mine-Jetpacks

description: How does it work? Blazes are replaced by helicopters and even though they do spawn in the Nether itâ€™s probably easier to get one by using a blaze spawn egg in the Overworld. One of the features for the Black Hawk helicopter is the storage container which has five available slots. The helicopter can only hold one person and thatâ€™s the pilot. Thatâ€™s definitely a downside but thereâ€™s currently nothing the creator can do about it. Before you can start flying you need to refill the fuel tank by using (or rather throwing) petrol cans (snowballs). It stays in air for 16 seconds before it starts descending. You can refill it while in air though if you want to fly for a longer amount of time. Hold a diamond sword to control it! The helicopter will automatically shoot enemies but itâ€™s required that is is at least within a 16 blocks radius of a hostile mob.
description-ru: Ифриты будут заменены вертолётами и несмотря на то, что их можно найти только в Нижнем мире, думаю, будет проще использовать яйца спавна, что породить их в обычном мире MCPE.
description-pt: Efrites serão substituídos por helicópteros e, apesar do fato de que eles só podem ser encontrados no Mundo Inferior, acho que será mais fácil usar os ovos de gênero que os geram no mundo comum do MCPE.
name: BlackHawk

description: Taming & Growth Stages To tame a t-rex you will need to find a juvenile. As they replace witches they can be found spawning in swamps. If you find one with its parent then prepare yourself to kill the big one first. It takes a lot of time for a baby t-rex to grow into an adult. If you try to tame one some meat and it isnâ€™t attracted to you by the meat then it means that it is no longer tameable and you will need to find another one. Untamed tyrannosauruses will attack other t-rex, animals, monsters and sometimes even players can become their victims if they arenâ€™t careful. Riding & Storage Once youâ€™ve tamed one you can mount it. Open the inventory while you are riding it to make use of the t-rex inventory. It got 27 slots. Just remember that all items you store there will disappear if the t-rex dies or if you lose it somehow.
description-ru: Для того, чтобы приручить себе собственного тиранозавра, Вам придётся сначала найти молодую особь! Так как новый моб заменяет криперов, тиранозавры будут распространены по всему миру! Если же Вы нашли юного тиранозавра вместе с его большим родителем, будьте готовы, что Вам придётся сначала убить взрослого защитника!
description-pt: Para domar seu próprio tiranossauro, você terá que encontrar um espécime jovem! Uma vez que a nova multidão substitui criminosos, os tiranossauros se espalharão pelo mundo! Se você encontrar um jovem tiranossauro com seu grande pai, prepare-se para que você primeiro tenha que matar um defensor adulto.
name: T-Rex

description: Settings > Global resources > Activate pack This is an addon which adds two new buttons to the in-game interface. The buttons can be used to switch faster between the different hotbar slots. Itâ€™s really useful in battles where you quickly need to change between different items such as weapons, potions, food and so on. Once you get over the learning curve I am sure this will be very helpful for PvP and similar! How does it work? The buttons are placed in the bottom right corner of the screen. Press either of the buttons to to change your active hotbar slot. Check out the video down below to really get an idea of how this works in-game.
description-ru: После установите этого дополнения у Вас на экране появятся две новые кнопки в правом нижнем углу, и с их помощью Вы должны управлять переключением активированного слота на нужный Вам.
description-pt: Depois de instalar este complemento, você verá dois novos botões no canto inferior direito e, com sua ajuda, você deve controlar a mudança do slot ativado para aquele que você precisa.
name: Fast Change Button

description: This is an addon which turns all of the mobs into vicious killers possessed by Herobrine. Even previously harmless mobs such as rabbits and cows will now go after players and try to kill them. This clearly makes survival mode a lot harder and more scary. But itâ€™s not just their behaviors which have been changed. Also their eyes have been changed into the ones of Herobrine! How does it work? All of the mobs have had their eyes replaced with the ones of Herobrine. It looks as if the mobs have been possessed by the devil. Itâ€™s not just that they look scary but from here on they will also chase you and try to kill you. Even rabbits! The sheep are probably the most dangerous mobs. They are both faster and stronger than most other previously friendly mobs. The mob heads have also been redesigned to have the white Herobrine eyes.
description-ru: Всем мобам были заменены глаза на глаза Херобрина. Теперь по мобам сразу видно, что с ними что-то случилось и настроены они точно не дружелюбно! Дело не только в их устрашающем виде, дело в том, что теперь каждый моб мира МКПЕ будет пытаться догнать и убить Вас!
description-pt: Todos os mobs foram substituídos por olhos nos olhos do herói. Agora, as multidões mostram imediatamente que algo aconteceu com elas e eles definitivamente não são amigáveis! Não é apenas o seu tipo incrível, o fato é que agora todas as multidões do mundo MCPE tentarão apanhar e matar você!
name: Herobrines Everywhere

description: How does it work? To tame a raptor you will first need to find one. But itâ€™s fairly easy since they replace pigs and this means that they will spawn in most biomes. The raptor cannot be tamed if it is full grown. It will only work if itâ€™s anywhere between the growth stage of one to three. Once youâ€™ve tamed it then you can place a saddle on the raptor and use it for riding. (It works similar to taming except that now youâ€™ll need a saddle.) Make sure it is fully grown otherwise it will not work. You can accelerate the growth progress by feeding it more meat. You can control the raptor by holding an iron sword in your hand. It is very fast and to make it stop running you will either need to get off or equip something else in your active hotbar slot. The raptor will act in your defense and attack hostile mobs either if you get attacked by one or if you are specifically attacking something. A tamed raptor have 27 available storage slots. You can access this inventory either by riding it and opening the inventory or by sneak, long press and press Open. (If you are on Windows 10 then simply sneak and right-click).
description-ru: Как это работает? Чтобы приручить хищную птицу, вам сначала нужно ее найти. Раптора нельзя приручить, если он вырос. Как только вы приручите его, вы можете поставить седло на хищника и использовать его для ходьбы. Вы можете управлять хищником, держа в руке железный меч.
description-pt: Como isso funciona? Para domar uma ave de rapina, primeiro você precisa encontrá-la. O raptor não pode ser domesticado se cresceu. Uma vez que você domina, você pode colocar a sela em um predador e usá-lo para caminhar. Você pode controlar um predador segurando uma espada de ferro na mão.
name: Raptor Blue

description: How does it work? The pig is replaced by a hardcore lucky block. Itâ€™s not really a block but it does look like one. You can find them spawning naturally in the world or spawn one using a pig spawn egg. You never really know what to expect once you come across one of these blocks. But for the most part something bad happens such as evil mobs spawning. But thereâ€™s  catch! Sometimes (on very rare occasions) something good happens. For example, in this case a bunch of diamond items spawned in front of me. But then again something much terrible can happen such as a lingering potion effect. I recommend you to always keep some weapon on you when destroying one of these blocks.
description-ru: Как и прежде, свинья мира будет заменена на волшебный блок. Вы можете найти их в мире MCPE, либо просто использовать яйцо спавна из творческого режима игры. Вы никогда не сможете точно ожидать, что произойдёт что-то определённое. Но чаще всего будет происходить что-то страшное, ведь мод стал более суровым!
description-pt: Como antes, o porco do mundo será substituído por um bloco mágico. Você pode encontrá-los no mundo do MCPE, ou simplesmente usar o ovo de geração do modo de jogo criativo. Você nunca pode esperar que algo definitivo aconteça. Mas, mais frequentemente, algo terrível acontecerá, porque o mod se tornou mais severo!
name: Hardcore Lucky Block

description: If you like PokÃ©mon then this is the perfect addon for you as it adds Pikachu and Raichu to the game. Catch (or rather tame) Pikachu and keep it as as as your loyal companion. You can even evolve it to Raichu by feeding it an emerald. Let it fight for your and it will unleash unleash powerful thunder shocks at your enemies in Minecraft. Taming Pikachu Pikachu replaces the pig and can be found spawning naturally in the Overworld. It can be tamed with carrots, beetroots or potatoes. (Tame chance: 33%) If you find a baby Pikachu then you need to feed it until itâ€™s an adult before you can tame it. A tamed Pikachu (or multiple tamed ones) will follow you around and protect you if needed.
description-ru: Пикачу заменяет свинью и его спавн может быть найден естественным образом в обычном мире. Его можно приручить морковью, свеклой или картофелем. (Шанс приручения: 33%)
description-pt: Pikachu substitui o porco e sua geração pode ser encontrada naturalmente no mundo comum. Pode ser domesticado com cenouras, beterrabas ou batatas. (Possibilidade de domesticação: 33%)
name: Pikachu and Raichu

description: How does it work? The Lamborghini is the fastest and most luxurious vehicle which you can currently get in Minecraft Pocket Edition. It spawns in swamp biomes since it replaces witches but you can also get one by using a witch spawn egg. Right now there are seats for just one person only. To drive the car you will need a key (also known as a carrot on a stick). Equip the key in your hand to start driving. To stop the car you have to switch your active bar slot to something else. This addon works great on multiplayer servers. You can spawn multiple vehicles and let players participate in drag racing. The vehicle is an astonishing work of art and it looks incredibly similar to the Lamborghini Aventador Couple which is the car it is based on.
description-ru: Lamborghini - дорогостоящий автомобиль, имеющий высокую скорость! Он спавнится в болотных биомах, ведь автомобиль является заменой ведьмы. Для управления этим автомобилем Вам понадобится специальный ключ (является заменой моркови на удочке).
description-pt: Lamborghini - um carro caro, com alta velocidade! Ele gerará biomas de maré, porque o carro é um substituto para uma bruxa. Para gerenciar este carro você precisará de uma chave especial (é um substituto para cenouras em uma cauda de pescar).
name: Sports Car Lamborghini

description: This addon has the potential to set in motion a series of natural disasters. The main change is for the lightning strikes which will now cause epic explosions and lots of fire. This can result in forest fires and massive destruction to the terrain and man-made structures. As much as this is just horrible it also creates a fun challenge which Iâ€™ve set up further down on this page. How does it work? Lightning strikes are much more dangerous than ever before since they will cause both great explosion and lots of fire. This creates a very difficult challenge for survival in Minecraft. Hereâ€™s my challenge proposal: Set difficulty to max; Set the weather to thunder and make it last forever (/weather thunder 1000000); Play in survival mode. Give it a try and see for how many days you can survive.
description-ru: Основное изменение - в атаках молнии, которые теперь вызывают эпические взрывы и много пожаров. Это может привести к лесным пожарам и массовым разрушениям на местности.
description-pt: A principal mudança é nos ataques de relâmpagos, que agora provocam explosões épicas e muitos incêndios. Isso pode levar a incêndios florestais e destruição maciça no solo.
name: ExplosiveLightning(Hardcore Survival)

description: How does it work? Llamas are a neutral mob which replace pigs in Minecraft. A llama has 11 health points (which is one more point than a pig) and drops 0-2 leathers when killed. They are hostile to wolves and creepers who they will spit at if they see them. A llama will never tolerate being hit. If you hit it youâ€™ll be spit violently at you. You can breed two llamas by feeding them each some wheat.  A few seconds after theyâ€™ve made love a baby llama (also known as a cria) will spawn. Place a carpet on the back of a llama to be able to ride them. Then hold a carrot on a stick in your hand to control the direction. A saddled llama can carry your items (27 available slots). iOS / Android: Sneak, long-tap on the llama and press Open to access the inventory. Windows 10: Sit on the lama and press â€˜Eâ€™ to open the inventory. Keep one as your pet by putting a leash around itâ€™s neck and have it follow you around wherever you go.
description-ru: Ламы – это нейтральные мобы. Ламы имеют 11 единиц здоровья. С лам выпадает после смерти от 0 до 2 кожи. Ламы — это замененные модели свиньи в MCPE.
description-pt: As lamelas são mafiosos neutros. Lamas tem 11 problemas de saúde. Uma vez que o lama cai após a morte de 0 para 2 de pele. Lamas são modelos substituídos de um porco no MCPE.
name: Lama

description: This addon brings some of the characters in the Undertale video game to Minecraft Pocket Edition. You can tame them and keep them as your companions on your journeys. There are also a couple of different bosses which you and your tamed Undertale friends can try to defeat in epic battles. How does it work? The Undertale characters can be found spawning in villages since they replace villagers. You can befriend one of them by giving them a heart (iron ingot). The Undertale characters (villagers) are incredibly powerful. This means that they will one-shot most mobs and bosses. There are also three bosses. The only way you will be able to defeat them is by taming a bunch of Undertale characters. The health and attack damages might actually be a bug because they just seem too overpowered.
description-ru: Спавн персонажей из Undertale может быть найден в деревнях, так как они заменяют деревенских жителей.
description-pt: O desdobramento dos personagens do Undertale pode ser encontrado nas aldeias, pois eles substituem os aldeões.
name: UnderTale Friends

description: The Nuke Addon turns the TNT block into a highly destructive nuclear weapon. Itâ€™s not something to play around with but itâ€™s definitely useful if you want to add some changes to the terrain around you. Itâ€™s not really comparable with a nuclear weapon in real life but itâ€™s definitely dangerous. How does it work? The TNT block is replaced by a nuclear weapon which when exploded will cause a huge explosion, lots of fire and total destruction. The golden armor is replaced by a hazmat suit. You can either ignite the block by using a flint & steel or by using redstone. Here are some examples of the type of damage the block can cause. Itâ€™s insanely dangerous and you only got 35 seconds to escape its area of impact. The creeper has been turned into a Nuke Creeper. The explosion is slightly larger than normally and it will also cause some fire.
description-ru: Теперь Вы не увидите в мире обычного TNT, ведь он будет заменён новым ядерным оружием, которое порождает большой взрыв и много-много огня! Также золотая броня теперь будет заменена на специальный защитный костюм!
description-pt: Agora você não verá o TNT usual no mundo, porque será substituído por uma nova arma nuclear, que gera uma grande explosão e muita incêndio! Além disso, a armadura de ouro agora será substituída por um terno de proteção especial!
name: Nuke

description: Boss Battle The wither storm boss is spawned just the same way as the normal wither boss. You will need four soul sands and three wither skulls to spawn it. Place the last wither skull on the top center soul sand to spawn it. Itâ€™s much larger than the normal wither boss and as a result also much stronger. Itâ€™s most likely impossible to defeat this boss all by yourself. But if you do, be sure to let us know in the comments how you did it! Shooting arrows is probably the easiest way to damage it in the beginning as it gives you the necessary range to avoid the explosions. As soon as it has lost somewhere around half of its health it will be immune to arrows. I tried using my sword to damage it but it was quite difficult to find the hitbox. The most efficient way to defeat it is by using Formidi Bombs (TNTs). Place lots of bombs, ignite them and hope that some of them will damage the boss. The Formidi Bomb has a longer fuse than an ordinary TNT but the explosion is greater. Eventually it was defeated. It drops one nether star. Itâ€™s a little bit cheap seeing as we just defeated the biggest boss in Minecraft Pocket Edition. But itâ€™s definitely a feat worth boasting of! At least if you defeated it in survival mode which I surely didnâ€™t. This is what the world looked like after we had our fun. I really recommend using this for a world seed thatâ€™s flat. Roulette is one such seed.
description-ru: Босс Шторм Иссушитель порождается так же как и обычный иссушитель. Для его порождения Вам понадобится 4 ед. песка душ и 3 черепа скелета-иссушителя. Этот босс будет гораздо больше чем обычный босс иссушитель. В результате чего он так же будет намного сильнее по сравнению с обычным боссом иссушителем.
description-pt: O chefe do Storm the Desiccator nasce, assim como o dessecador usual. Para criá-lo, você precisa de 4 unidades. banho de areia e 3 caveiras do esqueleto-dessecante. Este chefe será muito mais do que o chefe de eliminador habitual. Como resultado, também será muito mais forte em comparação com o chefe dessecante usual.
name: Wither Storm

description: How to find and tame BB-8? BB-8 is a droid which can be found spawning mostly everywhere in your world since it replaces the creeper. Itâ€™s a neutral mob which avoids players and will only attack if itâ€™s being provoked. Wild ones are automatically hostile toward monsters. You can tame BB-8 by giving it redstone. Once it has been tamed it can store items for you, defend you and just be a really nice companion on your next adventures. The droid functions similar to a hopper. It will automatically pick up items from the ground. You can also open the inventory similar to a chest. It will protect you by shooting lasers at your enemies. Armor & Weapons The leather armor has been changed into a Jedi Robe and the gold armor is now a Rebel Pilot armor suit. The diamond armor has been changed into the armor suit of a Deathtrooper. The iron armor is now a Stormtrooper and the bow has been replaced by a Stormtrooper blaster. The blaster shoots laser (arrows) and sets mobs on fire. You can no longer reuse arrows (or in this case lasers). Some of the swords have been changed to lightsabers. The attack damage is still the same. Itâ€™s only the textures which are different.
description-ru: B-88 это обычный дроид, которого можно найти практически везде, ведь он является заменой крипера! Это нейтральный моб мира МКПЕ, который будет атаковать Вас лишь в том случае, если Вы сами спровоцируете его. Дикие дроиды всегда враждебны по отношению к монстрам. Вы можете приручить B-88, если дадите ему редстоун.
description-pt: B-88 é um droide comum, que pode ser encontrado em quase todos os lugares, porque é um substituto para o creeper! Esta é uma multidão neutra do mundo MCPE, que irá atacá-lo somente se você o provocar você mesmo. Os droides selvagens são sempre hostis aos monstros. Você pode domar o B-88 se você lhe der um redstone.
name: BB-8 A Star Wars

description: Mod Amazing Mobs Addon replaces eight different mobs in the amazing creatures from mythical stories. Most of them you will be able to tame and use it as a pet or to move them around the world, such as in the scorpion. Agree to explore the world and to travel on it will be more fun in the company of one or more unusual creatures that will become indispensable to you friends.
description-ru: Мод заменит в Вашей любимой игре целых 8 мобов, и многие из них будут похожи на удивительных мифологических существ! Большинство из них Вы сможете приручить и держать в качестве личного питомца в мире. А также некоторых Вы сможете даже оседлать.
description-pt: Mod substituirá em seu jogo favorito até 8 mobs, e muitos deles parecerão criaturas mitológicas incríveis! A maioria deles você pode domar e manter como um animal de estimação pessoal no mundo. E também alguns que você pode montar.
name: Amazing Mobs

description: I Did you ever turn or change out zombies in someone else? With the help of fashion Â«Pirate ZombieÂ» for Minecraft Pocket Edition you will be able to dress a zombie pirates!
description-ru: Зомби из мира был заменён на нового пирата с деревянной ногой. Но не только внешний вид моба изменился, ведь теперь пират имеет увеличенный запас здоровья и увеличенный урон. И пират теперь никогда не заспавнится с каким-либо набором брони.
description-pt: Zombie do mundo foi substituído por um novo pirata com uma perna de madeira. Mas não só a aparência da multidão mudou, porque agora o pirata tem uma reserva de saúde aumentada e aumento do dano. E o pirata agora nunca adormecerá com qualquer conjunto de armaduras.
name: Pirate Zombie

description: You do not have enough power explosions in MCPE? Maud Â«Bigger ExplosionsÂ» to Minecraft Pocket Edition will increase the capacity of many explosions in the game that make it more interesting!
description-ru: Мод  восполнит Ваши желания и теперь Вы сможете наблюдать более мощные взрывы в MCPE. Увеличится мощность абсолютно всех взрывов, начиная от TNT, заканчивая взрывами зарядов Иссушителя.
description-pt: Mod irá preencher seus desejos e agora você pode observar explosões mais poderosas no MCPE. O poder de absolutamente todas as explosões aumentará, começando pela TNT, terminando com as explosões das cargas do Desecante.
name: Bigger Explosions

description: You think the world of Minecraft Pocket Edition mundane and boring? There is a lack of some color? Maud Â«ButterfliesÂ» Add to your game new colors, because now you will be able to spawn colorful butterflies!
description-ru: Мод заменит летучих мышей на новых красивых бабочек синего цвета! Это прекрасное дополнение, которое даст Вам возможность разукрасить мир, исключив из него летучих мышей.
description-pt: A moda substituirá os morcegos por novas e bonitas borboletas azuis! Esta é uma adição maravilhosa que lhe dará a oportunidade de decorar o mundo, eliminando morcegos.
name: Butterflies

description: Have you ever wanted to imagine a really strong defender? We present you the Â«Pig BotÂ» events, thanks to which you can make your own pig-cyborg in Minecraft Pocket Edition.
description-ru: Это всё тот же нейтральный моб, который будет защищать себя, если на него нападут. Но все-таки, он стал несколько больше и быстрее, чем обычная свинья в МКПЕ.
description-pt: Ainda é a mesma multidão neutra que se defenderá se for atacada. Mas ainda assim, ele se tornou um pouco maior e mais rápido do que o porco comum no MCPE.
name: Pig Bot

description: You think that to survive in the world of Minecraft Pocket Edition is easy? Then install the mod Â«T + S HardcoreÂ» for MCPE and look at the changes that will make you sweat!
description-ru: После установки мода не советую Вам идти в долгое плавание. Теперь под водой Вы сможете провести меньшее время, чем раньше.
description-pt: Depois de instalar o mod, não aconselho você a fazer uma longa viagem. Agora, sob a água, você pode gastar menos tempo do que antes.
name: T+S Hardcore

description: Maud Village Guards in the world adds Minecraft Pocket Edition reliable defenders of your home, or a huge database of the village!
description-ru: Деревенские жители-защитники заменят скелета-иссушителя, и теперь вы можете их найти в деревнях MCPE. Охранники носят железный меч с собой, а так же кольчужную броню. Охранники будут иметь строгие лица, так что не докапывайтесь к ним, иначе вам не поздоровится.
description-pt: Os defensores da aldeia substituirão o esqueleto-dessecante, e agora você pode encontrá-los nas aldeias do MCPE. Os guardas usam uma espada de ferro com eles, bem como a armadura de corrente. Os guardas terão rostos rigorosos, então não digite para eles, caso contrário você não vai ficar bem.
name: Village Guards

description: Tired of seeing the same mob in Minecraft Pocket Edition? Maud Medieval Mobs dilute your gameplay 5 new mobs, among which will be a replacement of the old boring mobs and new species!
description-ru: В Ваш игровой мир добавится сразу 7 различных мобов, каждый из которых будет иметь свои особенности и вид.
description-pt: Em seu mundo de jogos será adicionado imediatamente 7 mobs diferentes, cada um dos quais terá seus próprios recursos e aparência.
name: Medieval Mobs

description: Mod Redstone Engineering is able to increase the level of capability to Redstone in your app Minecraft Pocket Edition! At the moment it has snake two great mechanisms that work from the power of Redstone, and you perform different actions. In the same way as other addons with Redstone mod Redstone Engineering will help you to simplify some processes in the game and automate them.
description-ru: Данная модификация добавляет в мир два абсолютно новых блока, которые взаимодействуют с красным камнем. С помощью этих двух блоков вы сможете воссоздать новую эру механизмов т.к. с приходом новых элементов в индустрии механики появляются новые идеи создания чего-то нового, как правило!
description-pt: Esta modificação adiciona ao mundo dois blocos completamente novos que interagem com a pedra vermelha. Com a ajuda destes dois blocos, você poderá recriar uma nova era de mecanismos. Com o advento de novos elementos na indústria mecânica, novas idéias para criar algo novo estão emergindo, como regra!
name: Redstone Engenieering

description: A laser mod which give you access to two new guns in Minecraft Pocket Edition. A Laser Bazooka and a Laser Gun. The gun features of these are freaking amazing. Definitely worth trying it out! Features: Multiple Laser Weapons; The laser of the Laser Gun destroys any block you are gazing at; Shoot a laser with the Laser Bazooka and the laser will explode when it touches the ground; To see the full information and settings for the mod tap the settings icon to open the GUI; Personalize the weapons with the GUI; All Laser Weapons can be found in the creative inventory
description-ru: Мод добавит в игру несколько отличных лазерных пушек!
description-pt: Mod irá adicionar ao jogo várias armas laser excelentes!
name: Laser Guns Addon Desno365

description: Completely changes the physical characteristics of the set of existing mobs. Giant chickens, pigs-giants probably only dreamed about you. Once you install the mod - animals and mobs will be turned into huge giants. On some mobs you can even ride the top, for example on horseback.
description-ru: После того как вы установите мод, животные и мобы будут превращены в огромных гигантов. На некоторых мобах вы сможете даже ездить верхи, к примеру на лошадях.
description-pt: Uma vez que você instala o mod, animais e mobs serão transformados em gigantes gigantes. Em alguns mobs, você pode até andar no topo, por exemplo, a cavalo.
name: GigaMobs

description: Adds a few new items that you will need to turn into a human ant. Miniature converter - Bow. Giant transducer - Totem of immortality.
description-ru: Самой существенной особенностью является миниатюрный преобразователь(лук). Это предмет, который удерживается в руке и превратит Вас в супргероя-муравья.
description-pt: A característica mais importante é um conversor em miniatura (arco). Este é um objeto que é mantido em sua mão e transforma você em um super-super-formiga.
name: Ant-Man

description: Will add motorcycles to your favorite game! Before you can ride a bike and drive it, you will need to tame it. Once you place the saddle on the bike (open inventory, sitting on the bike and adding a saddle), you can control the direction of movement in the MCPE.
description-ru: Мод добавит в Вашу любимую игру мотоциклы! Прежде чем Вы можете кататься на байке и управлять им, Вас нужно будет приручить его, чтобы Вы могли контролировать его. Работает также, как приручение лошади. Сидите на велосипеде, пока не увидите частички сердец.
description-pt: Mod irá adicionar motocicletas ao seu jogo favorito! Antes de poder andar de bicicleta e controlá-lo, você precisará domar para que você possa controlá-lo. Também funciona como a domesticação de um cavalo. Sente-se na bicicleta até ver pedaços de corações.
name: Mine-Bikes

description: In the wild, snakes are quite dangerous creatures with malicious intentions. In case you manage to tame one of them in the world of MCPE, then their huge power will actually be in your favor. And then they will become your true friend, who has all the possibilities to keep you safe in most environments.
description-ru: В дикой природе они представляют собой довольно опасных существ со злобными намерениями. В случае, если Вам удастся приручить одного из них в мире МКПЕ, тогда их огромная сила будет на самом деле в Вашу пользу. И тогда они станут Вам верным другом, у которого есть все возможности, чтобы держать Вас в безопасности в большинстве сред.
description-pt: Na natureza, são criaturas bastante perigosas com intenções maliciosas. No caso de você conseguir domar um deles no mundo do MCPE, então seu enorme poder será realmente a seu favor. E então eles se tornarão seu verdadeiro amigo, que tem todas as possibilidades para mantê-lo seguro na maioria dos ambientes.
name: Snake

description: The creepers will have two new enemies - an iron golem and wolves.
description-ru: После установки мода, волки и големы приобретут для себя нового врага в лице крипера. Они будут атаковать крипера, а он, будучи не в состоянии что-либо сделать, будет беспомощно убегать от них!
description-pt: Depois de instalar o mod, os lobos e golems vão adquirir um novo inimigo em face do creeper. Eles atacarão o creeper, e ele, sendo incapaz de fazer qualquer coisa, fugirá indevidamente deles!
name: Attack The Creeper

description: Adding several new buttons to the interface of your favorite game, allowing you to more easily use the MCPE chat.
description-ru: После установки данного мода у Вас будет возможность повторно вводить в чат команды, которыми Вы уже пользовались ранее, Вы сможете завершать команды с помощью пары кликов, а также использовать некоторые другие функции.
description-pt: Depois de instalar este mod, você poderá reintroduzir os comandos de bate-papo que você já usou anteriormente, você pode completar comandos com alguns cliques, além de usar algumas outras funções.
name: Autocompletion

description: To improve the wolves, giving them the opportunity to wear armor, armor protects them much better and it's easy to see by the factor that they have got more health.
description-ru: Бронированные волки заменяют обычных волков. Если Вам удастся найти его в дикой природе, то Вы можете приручить его, дав ему костей.
description-pt: Lobos blindados substituem lobos comuns. Se você pode encontrá-lo na natureza, então você pode domesticá-lo, dando-lhe ossos.
name: Armored Wolf

description: Will replace in your favorite game as many as 8 mobs, and many of them will look like amazing mythological creatures!
description-ru: Мод заменит в Вашей любимой игре целых 8 мобов, и многие из них будут похожи на удивительных мифологических существ!
description-pt: Mod substituirá em seu jogo favorito até 8 mobs, e muitos deles parecerão criaturas mitológicas incríveis!
name: Amazing Mobs New

description: Love new challenges and challenges? Great, because the mod is good for old players who need a new and more sophisticated game experience. A lot of zombies will now appear in the world of MCPE in the daytime and from time to time in the Standard World will appear pigs.
description-ru: Множество зомби теперь будет появляться в мире МКПЕ в дневное время и время от времени в Обычном мире будут появляться свинозомби. Узнайте, есть ли у Вас все, что нужно, чтобы выжить в зомби апокалипсисе.
description-pt: Muitos zumbis agora aparecerão no mundo do MCPE durante o dia e, ocasionalmente, no Padrão Mundial aparecerão porcos. Descubra se você tem tudo o que precisa para sobreviver em um apocalipse zumbi.
name: A Proper Apocalypse

description: All passive mobs of MCPE now throw diamonds. Arrows now do not have gravity and cause as many as 700 damage. Bows can now fire through mobs and can kill a whole horde of mobs with just one shot. Even your bare fist inflicts 700 points of damage.
description-ru: Мод делает игру намного лучше и проще. Все пассивные мобы теперь бросают алмазы. Стрелы же теперь не имеют гравитации и наносят аж 700 единиц урона. Луки теперь могут стрелять через мобов и могут убить целую орду мобов только одним выстрелом. Даже Ваш голый кулак наносит 700 единиц урона.
description-pt: Maud torna o jogo muito melhor e mais fácil. Todas as multidões passivas agora jogam diamantes. As setas agora não têm gravidade e causam até 700 dano. Arcos agora podem disparar através de mobs e podem matar toda uma fenda de mobs com apenas um tiro. Mesmo seu punho nu inflige 700 pontos de dano.
name: Easy Mode

description: Includes in the world several new mobs and objects. Mobs are the three new vampires who are very dangerous creatures in the MCPA. Each of them will be hostile to any friendly beings he will encounter. But, of course, they have a certain weakness and this is daylight.
description-ru: Мобы - это три новых вампира, которые являются очень опасными существами в МКПЕ. Каждый из них будет враждебен к любым дружественным существам, с которыми он столкнётся. Но, конечно же, у них есть определённая слабость и это дневной свет.
description-pt: As multidões são os três novos vampiros que são criaturas muito perigosas no MCPA. Cada um deles será hostil a todos os seres amigáveis que ele encontrará. Mas, é claro, eles têm uma certa fraqueza e isso é luz do dia.
name: The Vampires

description: This, without a doubt, is one of the fastest monsters, so it will be an ideal mob for those who want to move very quickly in the MCPE.
description-ru: Снежные гориллы появляются в деревнях (поскольку они заменяют железных големов), но их также можно заспавнить, построив железную структуру с четырьмя железными блоками и одной тыквой.
description-pt: Os gorilas de neve aparecem nas aldeias (como substituem os golems de ferro), mas também podem ser engolidos pela construção de uma estrutura de ferro com quatro blocos de ferro e uma abóbora.
name: Gigant Snow Gorilla

description: Makes various mobs of the world go into battle, based on the fact that they are in a certain faction. When creating alliances, one of the mobs decided to help you and it's a creeper. You, without a doubt, will not be hampered by their help, since all the other hostile mobs in the world of MCPE show nothing but hatred and at the moment it seems that war is inevitable.
description-ru: У Вас появился хороший друг - крипер. Он больше не будет пытаться атаковать игроков, а вместо этого он будет пытаться нанести вред другим враждебным мобам, таким как паук.
description-pt: Você tem um bom amigo - um creeper. Ele não tentará mais atacar os jogadores, mas, em vez disso, ele tentará prejudicar outras multidões hostis, como uma aranha.
name: Mob Factions

description: Mod to improve armor sets
description-ru: Мод направлен на улучшение комплектов брони.
description-pt: Mod destina-se a melhorar armaduras.
name: Better Armor

description: Replaces the shkalker with several varieties of turrets, each of which is equipped with a unique weapon
description-ru: Чтобы получить турель в обычном мире Вам нужно использовать яйцо спавна шалкера. Возможно, можно будет каким-то образом переместить шалкера из Края в обычный мир
description-pt: Para obter uma torre no mundo comum, você precisa usar o ovo do shalker do gerador. Talvez seja possível de alguma forma mover o Shalker do Edge para o mundo comum
name: Protective Turrets

description: The three-headed gastritis is larger than the usual gastas and has three different faces
description-ru: Трёхглавый гаст заменяет обычного гаста и в результате Вы выясните, что он спавнится в Нижнем мире. Вы также можете использовать яйца спавна гаста, чтобы породить их в обычном мире.
description-pt: O gesto de três cabeças substitui o gast habitual e, como resultado, você descobrirá que irá surgir no Mundo Inferior. Você também pode usar os ovos de criação de gado para gerá-los no mundo comum.
name: 3 Headed Ghast Boss

description: transforms all humanoid mobs (that is, those who look like human beings) into women.
description-ru: Мод превращает всех гуманоидных мобов (то есть тех, кто выглядит как человек) в женщин.
description-pt: Mod transforma todos os mobs humanóides (isto é, aqueles que se parecem com seres humanos) em mulheres.
name: Girl Mobs

description: The spawn of a military aircraft can be found everywhere in the MCPE, as they are a substitute for chickens.
description-ru: Спавн военных самолёт можно найти повсюду, поскольку они являются заменой куриц. Самолёт может использовать в различных целях, но главной его функцией остаётся полёт. Чтобы запустить двигатель самолёта Вам понадобится лишь использовать топливные баки (снежки). Бросьте их на транспортное средство, чтобы использовать их.
description-pt: O desenvolvimento de uma aeronave militar pode ser encontrado em todos os lugares, pois eles são um substituto para galinhas. A aeronave pode usar para vários fins, mas sua principal função continua a ser o voo. Para iniciar o motor da aeronave, você precisará apenas usar tanques de combustível (bolas de neve). Jogue-os no veículo para usá-los.
name: War Plane New

description: Will make all blocks of the MCPE world invisible, except for ores. You can find that this is a fraud, but this mod can help even those who are just looking for rare sideways.
description-ru: Данный мод работает как текстур пак, поэтому в игре у Вас не будет никакой возможности включать, либо выключать просвечивание блоков. Для возврата обычных настроек текстур Вам нужно будет выключить текстур пак и перезапустить игру.
description-pt: Este mod funciona como um pacote de textura, então no jogo você não terá nenhuma opção para ativar ou desativar a translucidez de blocos. Para retornar configurações de textura normais, você precisará desligar o pacote de textura e reiniciar o jogo.
name: Useless X-Ray

description: You can only get new items with a zombie drop. Zombies now have the ability to launch a zombie brain, a zombie eye (both are new), or one of the 9 light sabers. But only the zombies have light swords, which they can throw, but the possibility of throwing them is very small.
description-ru: Череп и блоки головы были заменены световыми мечами. Другого способа получить их нет, кроме как выбивать их из мобов (крайне редко) или получить их через инвентарь творческого режима.
description-pt: Os blocos do crânio e da cabeça foram substituídos por espadas leves. Não há outra maneira de obtê-los, exceto para derrubá-los das mobs (extremamente raramente) ou obtê-los através do inventário do regime criativo.
name: Lightsabers

description: Mod will reduce the size of all spiders in the world to a more realistic size. It will now be more difficult to kill them, as the area of impact on them also decreased significantly.
description-ru: Мод  уменьшит размеры всех пауков мира до более реалистичного размера. Теперь их будет труднее убить, так как область удара по ним также значительно уменьшилась. Однако, для того чтобы сбалансировать их силы, им была дана новая слабость и это вода.
description-pt: Mod reduzirá o tamanho de todas as aranhas do mundo para um tamanho mais realista. Agora, será mais difícil matá-los, já que a área de impacto sobre eles também diminuiu significativamente. No entanto, para equilibrar sua força, eles receberam uma nova fraqueza e isso é água.
name: Smaller Spiders

description: Keep your garden in good condition from these rabbits that eat your carrots. As soon as they see the scarecrow, they will immediately start running away. Add the following items to the armor stand Pumpkin, Leather Chest, Leather Leggings
description-ru: Держите свой сад в хорошем состоянии от кроликов, которые едят вашу морковь. Как только они увидят пугало, они начнут бежать. Тыква, кожаная броня, кожаные штаны - рецепт пугало.
description-pt: Mantenha seu jardim em boas condições de coelhos que comem suas cenouras. Assim que verão o espantalho, eles começarão a correr. Abóbora, armadura de couro, calças de couro - receita para um espantalho.
name: Scarecow

description: Mod will replace one of the mobs with a lucky block that can drop about 100 different items of MCPE.
description-ru: Свиньи заменяются блоком удачи. Это означает, что Вы обнаружите то, что Вы найдёте их естественный спавн в большинстве биомов.
description-pt: Os porcos são substituídos por um bloco de sorte. Isso significa que você achará que você encontrará a sua geração natural na maioria dos biomas.
name: Unpredictable Lucky Blocks

description: To tame a polar bear in the MCPE you will need raw fish. This only works with raw fish. Continue to feed him with a fish, until you see a few hearts, and then you will find out that he was tamed.
description-ru: Чтобы приручить белого медведя в МКПЕ Вам понадобится сырая рыба. Это работает только с сырой рыбой. Они будут следовать за Вами и Вы даже сможете кататься на них верхом.
description-pt: Para domar um urso polar no MCPE, você precisará de peixe cru. Isso só funciona com peixes crus. Eles vão segui-lo e você pode montá-los.
name: Tameable Polar Bears

description: Turns the efreet into a terribly dangerous boss. He, without a doubt, has the ability to kill most of the MKPE mobs and players, if they are not well equipped to fight it. The method of combat is very similar to the usual eft, but the main difference is that it is much stronger and has more health.
description-ru: У босса ифрита есть способности и его очень трудно победить. Поскольку он заменяет обычного ифрита, он будет появляться только в Нижнем мире MCPE, только если Вы не используете яйцо спавна, чтобы создать его в каком-нибудь другом месте. Здоровье: 350 сердец.
description-pt: Um chefe Efreet tem habilidades e é muito difícil de vencer. Como ele substitui o efreet habitual, ele só aparecerá no Mundo Inferior do MCPE, somente se você não usar o ovo de geração para criá-lo em algum outro lugar. Saúde: 350 corações.
name: Blaze Boss

description: In the game there will be a new item that can be used for a simpler search of underground structures. You can get the item of the magic glass tracking by using fishing. It is also possible to find them in chests from fortresses.
description-ru: В игре появится новый предмет, который можно будет использовать для более простого поиска подземных сооружений. Это невероятно полезно, потому что игроку необходимо держать определённый предмет, чтобы видеть сквозь стены во время игры в MCPE.
description-pt: Haverá um novo item no jogo que você pode usar para encontrar mais facilmente estruturas subterrâneas. Isso é incrivelmente útil, porque o jogador precisa segurar um determinado objeto para ver através de paredes enquanto joga no MCPE.
name: Magic Spy Glass

description: Open the pause menu and click the Take Screenshot button to take a screen shot of the game. All screenshots are saved in the folder Screenshots
description-ru: В меню паузы появится кнопка Take Screenshot (Сделать скриншот), чтобы сделать снимок экрана в игре.
description-pt: No menu de pausa, o botão Tire a tela aparecerá para tirar uma captura de tela do jogo.
name: Take Screenshot Button

description: Allows you to use the old horse model and texture.
description-ru: Мод позволяет использовать старую модель лошади и текстуры.
description-pt: Mod permite que você use o modelo e a textura do cavalo antigo.
name: The Old Horses

description: It's a great way to enter the Christmas spirit or just another great option if you really enjoy enjoying the winter landscapes.
description-ru: Мир будет постоянно находиться в зимнем сезоне. Это относится ко всем биомам, которые включают в себя траву и листья, такие как равнины или лесные биомы, но никак не пустыни. Это отличный способ войти в рождественский дух или просто еще один прекрасный вариант, если Вы действительно любите наслаждаться зимними пейзажами.
description-pt: O mundo sempre estará no inverno. Isso se aplica a todos os biomas que incluem grama e folhas, como planícies ou biomas de floresta, mas não desertos. É uma ótima maneira de entrar no espírito de Natal ou apenas outra ótima opção se você realmente gosta de desfrutar das paisagens de inverno.
name: Winter Season

description: Makes the survival mode more difficult, because your everyday health in the amount of 10 hearts will decrease to 5 hearts.
description-ru: Как только Вы появитесь в мире (и переключитесь в режим выживания, если Вы были в режиме творчества), то заметите, что Ваш бар здоровья включает только пять сердец. Это самая заметная особенность, но на самом деле их больше.
description-pt: Uma vez que você aparece no mundo (e mude para o modo de sobrevivência, se você estivesse no modo de criatividade), você notará que sua barra de saúde inclui apenas cinco corações. Esta é a característica mais notável, mas, de fato, há mais delas.
name: Five Heart

description: Mod adds 16 new blocks and 10 new fences in MCPE. Use the boat on the peasant to turn it into a diver. You need to trade with him to unblock all his offers, including new coral blocks and fences.
description-ru: Используйте лодку на крестьянине, чтобы превратить его в водолаза. Вам нужно торговать с ним, чтобы разблокировать все его предложения, в том числе новые коралловые блоки и заборы.
description-pt: Use o barco no camponês para transformá-lo em um mergulhador. Você precisa negociar com ele para desbloquear todas as suas ofertas, incluindo novos blocos e cercas de corais.
name: Coral Blocks

description: Extended version of the usual zombies with a skin pack. The mutant body from YouTube is much larger and this for the better changes its ability to fight, and also it runs faster than normal. Health 75 hearts
description-ru: Зомби-мутант, добавляемый модом, представляет по сути представляет собой расширенную версию обычного зомби. Тело мутанта от ютубера намного больше и это в лучшую сторону меняет его способность сражаться, а также он бегает быстрее, чем обычный.
description-pt: O mutante zumbi, adicionado pelo mod, representa essencialmente uma versão estendida do zumbi usual. O corpo mutante do YouTube é muito maior e isso para melhor mudar sua capacidade de lutar e também corre mais rápido do que o normal.
name: Mutant Zombie

description: Tamed parrots now multiply, and even adds cute little parrots to the game MCPE. They are absolutely delicious! Tame, and then feed the two parrots with seeds so that they can multiply.
description-ru: Приручите, а затем кормите двух попугаем семенами, чтобы они могли размножаться. В результате в мире появится очаровательный детёныш попугая. Это единственный способ, чтобы найти и получить детёныша попугая. Вы никак не можете повлиять на то, какого цвета будет детёныш.
description-pt: Tame, e depois alimente os dois papagaios com sementes para que possam se multiplicar. Como resultado, um cachorrinho encantador aparecerá no mundo. Esta é a única maneira de encontrar e obter um papagaio de bebê. Você não pode influenciar de forma alguma a cor do filhote.
name: Baby Parrots

description: Mod turns a cadavre into a lucky block.
description-ru: Поскольку удачливый блок заменяет кадавра, Вам придётся отправиться в пустыню, чтобы найти её в режиме выживания. Если Вы не хотите идти на охоту, то найдите яйцо спавна кадавра в творческом инвентаре и используйте его, чтобы создать удачливый блок в МКПЕ.
description-pt: Uma vez que um bloco de sorte substitui o cadáver, você terá que ir ao deserto para encontrá-lo no modo de sobrevivência. Se você não quer ir caçar, então encontre o ovo de geração do cadavre no inventário criativo e use-o para criar uma unidade afortunada no MCPE.
name: Vladu11’s Lucky Blocks

description: Mod will allow you to replace the mobs with characters from the saga of slendytubbies.
description-ru: Мод позволит Вам заменить мобов персонажами из саги slendytubbies.
description-pt: Mod irá permitir que você substitua os mobs por personagens da saga de slendytubbies.
name: Slendytubbies

description: Mod adds another 10 reptiles to the world
description-ru: Мод добавляет ещё 10 рептилий, которые включают в себя: черепах, игуан, ящериц, хамелеонов, тараканов, комодо-драконов, крокодилов, гекконов, экзотических и опасных рептилий.
description-pt: Maud acrescenta outros 10 répteis, que incluem: tartarugas, iguanas, lagartos, camaleões, baratas, dragões komodo, crocodilos, geckos, répteis exóticos e perigosos.
name: Reptilcraft

description: Every time an octopus appears, there is a chance of 50% that a turtle will appear instead. But as they replace pigs, they can also be found on land where they will suffocate if they do not get into the water fast enough.
description-ru: Каждый раз, когда появляется спрут, появляется шанс, равный 50%, что вместо него появится черепаха. Но поскольку они заменяют свиней, они также могут быть найдены на суше, где они задохнутся, если не попадут в воду достаточно быстро.
description-pt: Toda vez que um polvo aparece, há uma chance de 50% de que uma tartaruga aparecerá em vez disso. Mas, como eles substituem os porcos, eles também podem ser encontrados em terra onde eles sufocarão se eles não entrarem na água rapidamente o suficiente.
name: The Turtles

description: Snow Golem has turned into a very dangerous snowman called Snoogrant after applying fashion! He is considered a boss because of his enormous powers, which consist in his wide variety of attack styles, as well as in increased health.
description-ru: Сноугрант имеет редкий спавн в снежном биоме. Но если Вы не хотите тратить много времени на то, чтобы найти его, то вполне можете создать его самостоятельно, используя ту же схему, которую Вы используете для спавна железного голема.
description-pt: Snoogrant tem uma geração rara no bioma da neve. Mas se você não quer gastar muito tempo encontrando, então você pode criá-lo usando o mesmo esquema que você usa para gerar um golem de ferro.
name: Snowgrunt

description: Endergerg is a new boss that you can spawn just like you create an iron golem. He is very strong and has several different styles of attack, which he uses to defeat his enemies.
description-ru: Так как босс заменяет железного голема, Вы можете использовать железные блоки и тыкву, чтобы создать его. Если Вы его заспавните, то Вам может потребоваться спровоцировать его, чтобы начать бой.
description-pt: Uma vez que o chefe substitui o golem de ferro, você pode usar os blocos de ferro e a abóbora para criá-lo. Se você dormir, então talvez seja necessário provocar isso para começar a luta.
name: Endergarg

description: This is an ancient creature that adds the mod most dangerous at night and has three types of attacks that he will use to hit his enemies in the MCPA. You really do not even want to face these creatures unless you are equipped with a diamond sword and, most likely, a full set of armor.
description-ru: Поскольку король нижнего мира заменяет пауков, он будет очень распространён в обычном мире и может быть найден в большинстве биомов. Он абсолютно безвреден (и невосприимчив к наносимым атакам) в дневное время (или если его окружает большое количество света). Это потому, что он будет спать в это время.
description-pt: Como o rei do mundo inferior substitui as aranhas, será muito comum no mundo comum e pode ser encontrado na maioria dos biomas. É absolutamente inofensivo (e imune aos ataques) durante o dia (ou se é cercado por uma grande quantidade de luz). Isso é porque ele vai dormir neste momento.
name: Netherking

description: A luxury sports car, and, finally, you can enjoy it also in MCPE. If you are looking for something different from a horse or donkey to travel, then this car is definitely a good upgrade. You need a key (carrots on a stick) to drive the car.
description-ru: Спавн машины был замечен в болотах МКПЕ, поэтому можно сделать вывод, что она заменяет ведьму. Вам нужен ключ (морковь на палочке), чтобы управлять автомобилем.
description-pt: A geração do carro foi vista nos pântanos do MCPE, então podemos concluir que ele substitui a bruxa. Você precisa de uma chave (cenouras em uma vara) para dirigir o carro.
name: Bugatti Veyron Grand Super Sport

description: This is a really good package for MCPE, if you want some cool things to decorate your worlds, as they will look more realistic than if you had to build them only with blocks.
description-ru: Новая мебель заменяет некоторые из существующих блоков голов и черепов в игре. Это очень редкие дропы с мобов, поэтому самый простой способ их найти - использовать инвентарь в творческом режиме.
description-pt: O mobiliário novo substitui alguns dos blocos existentes de cabeças e crânios no jogo. Esta é uma queda muito rara das mobs, então a maneira mais fácil de encontrá-las é usar o inventário no modo criativo.
name: Decoration

description: Mod will add you friends in MCPE! This mod will replace skeletons on friendly archers with the eyes of the Wanderer Edge, but very similar to humans! The archers. as any pets, you need to tame, and then they will be your personal bodyguards in the game
description-ru: Скелетоны были заменены на дружественных защитников из мира Странников Края. Вы сможете приручить такого телохранителя в МКПЕ, если накормите его хлебом&
description-pt: Os esqueletos foram substituídos por defensores amigáveis do World of Wanderers Edge. Você pode domar um guarda-costas no MCPA, se você o alimenta com pão e
name: Ender Archer Friend
